storyInfo: Degenbrecher and the Trilby Asher fight atop the statue of Kjeragandr, and the Trilby Asher is sent flying. Kjarr watches from below with great interest. The Viscount and Leto dredge up the Trilby Asher and the Saintess arrives to personally invite them all to the bonfire banquet.

attributes.content: Hey, maid, everyone else about has already scarpered off. Why are you still here?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Shouldn't you have left as well, Madam Sciurus?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do I really have to, just because you tell me to?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: This statue is the fruit of everyone's labors. If anything happened to it, how could I break the bad news to them?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Is it the fruits of everyone's labors, or Enciodes's?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No wonder I saw the Saintess hold you back just now. Think I saw her tell you something too.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You hardly sound surprised.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm not an idiot. She looked completely blindsided, but how could that possibly be?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's just that, looking at it from her perspective, the best position she can be in is knowing a little bit, but not too much.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And so she sent you to go the last mile for her, huh? Well, what is it then?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Of the people currently drawing close, one is Degenbrecher, while the other is a Trilby Asher from Victoria.
attributes.name: Kjarr
Sciurus
attributes.content: A Trilby Asher?!

attributes.name: Sciurus
attributes.content: He couldn't... No, he wouldn't go that far...
Did the Saintess ask you to stay, just so you could warn me about this?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Let's go with that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Allow me to look after the statue in your stead.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This ends here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Urk...!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Sure enough, you are the Black Knight. I will not underestimate you.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But that is precisely why you should realize that you cannot best me.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I like the confidence.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But my patience runs thin.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The way you scurry and flit about has already started to bore me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: My apologies, Madam. I have been derelict in my duty, if you feel that way.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: However, if I may speak freely, Madam Degenbrecher, I feel no murderous intent in your swings.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
'Trilby Asher'
attributes.content: You were invincible during your days in Kazimierz, the Black Knight that struck terror into her opponents with her mighty blade, but now you're reduced to using these edgeless toys—

attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
attributes.content: Grkh!
These edgeless toys will be enough for the likes of you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I only ever used that Leithanian greatsword in competitions. The sponsors demanded it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: 'The greatsword-wielding Leithanian warrior', 'the Artsless freak' ...Call me what you will. It matters not.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But it's time to cut this dance short. You seem to have forgotten something.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The reason why I started using these degenbrechers in the first place—
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What...Ugh!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The frosty bite of her blow stops his words before they leave his mouth.
The frigid winds of Kjerag stab him, the unfeeling mountain snows crush him, and the ice-cold degenbrechers slam into him with all the force of a glacier.
There is no resisting such an attack.
Gah...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is but a warning.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There are many who wish to cause trouble for Enciodes, and if I could crush them all dead, there would be a lot less trouble for me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But unfortunately, there are some people who are much more useful alive than dead.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You, for example.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*... I see.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I thank you for your mercy, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: These weapons.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I use them for a very simple reason.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: They have no edge, so it's much easier for me to keep men like you alive.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If I were to use a little more force with these blunt weapons, most would become nothing more than mincemeat.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That's how it's always been, from the very start.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Among those who step up to fight me, many would be easily crushed.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It does not matter if you are a caster of Leithanien, or a knight of Kazimierz. In the end, you are the same.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Faith, ideals, grit and perseverance, firm determination. They all fall before sheer brute force.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's hilarious.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Being broken too easily is its own complication.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The woman who took her weapon's name looks down disdainfully upon the Victorian before her. He had been by no means an easy foe to handle, so it was up to her, and only her, to face him.
But even so, it has not been particularly difficult to defeat him.
The road from being a destitute, Artsless nobody to becoming the Black Knight, three-time consecutive champion, was not an easy one to walk.
Compared to that, anything that came after was only a trifle.
Hah... By your standards as the Black Knight, the 'natural-born warrior', there can't be many who aren't considered 'fragile'.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If you had been even the slightest bit more serious, I would have had to put in a lot more effort.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Unfortunately for me, as an intelligence officer, it is not in battle where I have to get serious.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Wow, they've already climbed up all the scaffolding.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: These Trilby Ashers are skilled indeed.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: There is not a person in all of Kjerag who could scarper from the mountains to this island while getting hunted by Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Could there be many such people in Victoria?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Truly, there are terrors all about these lands.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Indeed. There are terrors all about these lands, and we must cope with them in our own way every day. I have half a mind to find a replacement for myself as Saintess.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, perish the thought. Wasn't it you who sought to be Saintess in the first place?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You truly do resemble your brother in that regard. You both love giving yourselves things to do.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I am nothing like him.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, yes, alright, he's very much like you, then. Is that better?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do you still remember our agreement?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hmm? Which one?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This is no time for jokes, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, of course I remember. 'Kjeragandr need only watch over her people, nothing more'.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: At the time, I had already begun doing some things under the table... If we depended on Her even for this matter, then whether it was him or me, our ideals would be but empty words and bluster.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's not quite so easy being a bystander, you know.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I ask Her only to be patient for a little while longer.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Alright then, although I'm not sure if She can even hear our little agreement.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Anyway, I just came to see if we could change this statue a bit is all.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I can't believe you haven't given up on that ye—
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This is one matter that I'm definitely not giving up on.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Wow. I think the statue might be a bit slanted after Degenbrecher's kick just now.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That Trilby Asher isn't half bad either. Him grabbing the statue's finger to adjust the balance of his body sure was a surprise. That there's the real deal.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do you think they could help me thin out the face a bit?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: *sigh* I was far too naïve from the start, thinking that it didn't matter what I looked like on the outside. Made me not really care much about my appearance.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: After many interactions with others, my aesthetic senses changed alongside the people, and so we end up with the look I have today.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But those drawings in those ancient tomes persisted all the while. I should have taken those books away from the Edelweiss clan when they were out of the house.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Who expected them to suddenly decide to build a statue of Kjeragandr anyway?!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Those two sure climbed up to the top of the statue real quick.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Ah, that's right, shave the cheek on that side down a little bit more.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Damn it, don't shave down the sides of Her hair too! I quite like those!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hmm... From this angle it doesn't look half bad though, does it?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Where was I? Right, after getting to know Enya, I started to look after my appearance more.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I would always go with her when she would sneak out for walks, recommending me various cute ornaments and trinkets. After who knows how long, I started to like those things myself.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hmm. Maybe we can replace that lock of hair that got shaved off with a big piece of jewelry.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I should write that down somewhere.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Must be tough being a Trilby Asher. Looked like he was about to jump down from the top of the head himself, but then Degenbrecher sent him flying with a mean kick.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Poor guy.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, those other fellows that Degenbrecher fought. I wonder if they felt the same way as this Trilby Asher?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Knowing that you are not truly a match, but with no other option but to struggle for your life, unsure if you'll have the opportunity to get out in one piece?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Until finally you realize that there really is no such opportunity.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Those with more mercenary motivations for battle are much weaker than him.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Are you satisfied?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You seemed to be quite pleased while you were watching us give the statue a light trim.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Is it to your liking now?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's not bad, I'd say.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Despite the fall, he is not the type to die so easily. He will be back soon enough.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll resume keeping an eye on him.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're certain he won't best you next time?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: He was no match for you during that fight earlier, but I fear that if he had truly put his heart into it, he would have proven the victor quite easily.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Moreover, there's hardly a guarantee that he's not bait, correct?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I will leave that sort of thinking up to Enciodes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enciodes cannot be here at the moment. Surely you know that better than me.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Allow me to take the lead.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Or, to be more precise, allow the Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjarr buzzes the communications terminal in her hand.
Did you get all that, Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Allow me to take the lead.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You did well, Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: My pleasure.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Will you be coming to the bonfire banquet tonight?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I'm afraid not. I'm not fond of busy parties.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What a shame.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What did you have in mind?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I would like you to watch over a foreign envoy. I believe diplomacy will prove more effective than force in this case.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: He might not actually be a foreign envoy.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He might very well be.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Alright. I am in your hands, Saintess.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Uh, you know the exit's in the other direction, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Whew, he should be able to pull through, right?
attributes.name: Inquisitive Local

attributes.content: Alright, stop rubbernecking, clear the way. Let's think of a way to get him out of that hole first.
attributes.name: Eager Local

attributes.content: Based on his clothes, he looks like some kind of foreigner. I don't think even we could handle water that cold...
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: Hey, mind if I ask what's going on here?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Some poor fellow just flew on over here from the island in the middle of the lake. Smashed a hole right through the ice.
attributes.name: Inquisitive Local

attributes.content: What?! Tsch—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, coming through, make way, excuse me, thank you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Harold squeezes his way through the crowd, and the moment he sees what all the fuss is about, he cannot help but laugh.
A perfect circle has been punched through the frozen surface of the lake, and in the center of that circle floats a 'corpse'.
And so it fell to him to come to the rescue.
This water, brrrr— These old bones ain't spry enough to handle that.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Excuse me, anyone got some kind of stick or the other on hand? He's a friend of mine and I'm here to get him out of there.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hmm, nothing like that over here. Maybe you can head over to the nearby finning village, ask someone there if you can borrow a finning pole?
attributes.name: Eager Local

attributes.content: No need, I've got something that can help!

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Nice, thanks—

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Eh?! Rosalind?
Hey, dedushka. Fancy meeting you here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll lend you my weapon. Let's get that guy out of there.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Cheers.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: We'll help too!
attributes.name: Spectating Locals

attributes.content: Using Rosalind's weapon, the people work together to dredge the 'corpse' up and out of the hole.
Looks like he still hasn't kicked the bucket.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I probably shouldn't be saying this, but if he really had died, I would have had a whole lot of beastshite on my hands.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Thankfully the one who did this had the same idea, so they held back a bit.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Let's get this fellow somewhere warm for now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ho, shopkeep, allow us to borrow your fireplace for a spell.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Isn't this John? He should be up the mountain. How'd he get his ass kicked down here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Up the mountain? You've met him before?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I met him up there...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And then what?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Ah, no, nothing. It'd be a pain to explain.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What about you, dedushka? What're you going to do these next two days?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Haha, I'm just here to clap at the Kjeragandr statue unveiling ceremony tomorrow, as a Victorian delegate. After that, I guess I'll be heading back home straight away.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If I manage to find one last opportunity before I go, I'd like to walk about and buy some souvenirs for the wife and kid back home.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sounds like you've got a lot of free time on your hands, dedushka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: When you're young, you feel like you have a thousand and one different things that you need to get done. But when you get to around my age, you'll learn that some free time never did any harm.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Ah, the 'dead' rise.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Bluggh—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: How's it hanging, 'John'?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Madam Larina? And the Lord Viscount?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Good, good. I was just about to have a chat with my dearly-departed grandfather.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The hell happened to you anyway?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's a bit of a long story.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Are you getting along with your father?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Eh, alright enough, I guess.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Father? Did I miss something?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's a bit of a long story.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher' & Leto

attributes.content: Seriously, what happened, 'John'?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You've managed to become chummier with Rosalind than me, right under my nose.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Finally found you.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Eh?! Saintess?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Saintess?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Pramanix?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah, Leto! You're here too, perfect.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Lord Viscount, I hope you remember tonight's bonfire banquet by the lakeside. The one that will serve as a warm-up before tomorrow's ceremony?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: I had heard that you had been having your fill of scenic tours of Kjerag lately, and I feared that you had forgotten, which is why I decided to give you this little reminder.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Of course I remember! Worry not, for I shall definitely be there.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Will you be coming too, Leto?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: To the bonfire banquet? Sure, I'll come.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And I believe this Trilby Asher is a friend of yours?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Yes... quite.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As a friend of the Lord Viscount, naturally you too are a guest of Kjerag. I hope that you will do me the honor of attending our humble banquet.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Whatever reason could I have to refuse an invitation from the Saintess herself?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Very well. It's settled then.
attributes.name: Pramanix
